definition: when everybody gathers fuel, the flames are higher (idiom)/the more people, the more strength
pinyin: zhong4 ren2 shi2 chai2 huo3 yan4 gao1

definition: abbr. for 眾議院|众议院[Zhong4 yi4 yuan4], House of Representatives
to pick up/to collate or arrange/ten (banker's anti-fraud numeral)
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
